definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

sentences.english: The accident of aortic cannulation is very dangerous and the mortality of this complication is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 主动脉插管意外极为凶险，死亡率非常高。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the application of continuous suture in aortic valve replacement.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨主动脉瓣置换中连续缝合方法的应用。

sentences.english: Aortic continuity was achieved by surgical anastomosis of artificial vessel.
sentences.chinese: 确诊后做主动脉弓及降主动脉人工血管吻合术。

sentences.english: Aortic continuity was achieved by surgical anastomosis of artificial vessel.
sentences.chinese: 确诊后做主动脉弓及降主动脉人工血管吻合术。

sentences.english: Can EVAR become the first choice for AAA repair?
sentences.chinese: 是否可以成为腹主动脉瘤的第一选择？

sentences.english: The origins both renal ostia from the aorta were at the same level in 11 cases.
sentences.chinese: 两肾动脉开口位于腹主动脉同一水平面11例。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the methods and experiences of aortic arch surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结主动脉弓部手术的方法和临床经验。

sentences.english: AMVS should be differentially diagnosed with rupture of aortic sinus aneurysm.
sentences.chinese: 超声心动图诊断AMVS需与主动脉窦瘤破裂鉴别。

sentences.english: In reconstruction of right ventricle to pulmonary outflow tract, aortic homograft were used in all cases.
sentences.chinese: 右心室肺动脉流出道重建，均用同种带瓣主动脉。

sentences.english: Methods Measurement of isometric force of rabbit thoracic aorta rings was performed.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用家兔离体主动脉环进行等长张力实验。

sentences.english: The most common causes are aortic or pulmonic valve regurgitation.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的原因是主动脉瓣或肺动脉瓣反流。

sentences.english: The aorta above the valve displays a smooth intima with no atherosclerosis .
sentences.chinese: 主动脉瓣上方的血管内膜光滑，不伴有动脉粥样硬化。

sentences.english: The maintenance of higher aortic perfusion pressure intraoperatively must be emphasized to decrease the likelihood of air embolism.
sentences.chinese: 应强调术中保持较高的主动脉灌注压以防止空气栓塞。

sentences.english: The operation of inosculation under the aorta of left chest notches is also simple and safe with the fewest complications.
sentences.chinese: 左胸切口主动脉弓下吻合，手术简便安全并发症最少。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the correlation between aorta atheromatous plaque and cerebral infarction(CI).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨主动脉粥样斑块与脑梗死的相关性。

sentences.english: Conclusion Early treatment of congenital subaortic stenosis should be conducted when the disease was diagnosed.
sentences.chinese: 结论先天性主动脉瓣下狭窄一经诊断宜早行手术治疗。

definition: main artery (blood vessel)/fig. main highway/arterial road
basilar artery (central artery of the brain)
